title: Taken
creator_credit: Hayley Cloake, Libby Porter, Elisabeth Anne Green, XY2 and Cinemedia
brief_description: When Sophie finds a message on her answering machine from recently separated husband, Michael, she strikes an unlikely alliance with his ‘errand boy’, Jason. Cast includes Kerry Armstrong, Samuel Johnston and David Michod.
creator_credit_for_label: Hayley Cloake, Libby Porter, Elisabeth Anne Green, XY2 and Cinemedia
